sentences.en: A senior White House official said the agreement is close.
sentences.cn: 白宫的一位高级官员说即将达成协议。

sentences.en: Always seek professional legal advice before entering into any agreement.
sentences.cn: 在签订任何协定之前一定要先征求法律专业人士的意见。

sentences.en: David ran through the agreement with Guy, point by point.
sentences.cn: 戴维和盖伊一起把协议逐条看了一遍.

sentences.en: Find Bernie and get him to knock an agreement together.
sentences.cn: 找到伯尼，让他尽快拟好一份协议。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He managed to reach a partial agreement with both republics.
sentences.cn: 他设法与两个共和国都达成了部分协议。

sentences.en: He skirted the hardest issues, concentrating on areas of possible agreement.
sentences.cn: 他避开了最棘手的问题，将精力集中于有可能达成一致的领域。

sentences.en: I feel such a mug for signing the agreement.
sentences.cn: 我觉得签这个协议真傻。

sentences.en: If no agreement was reached, the army would step in.
sentences.cn: 如果无法达成协议，军队将会介入。

sentences.en: It is easier for two parties to reach agreement than for three.
sentences.cn: 两方达成一致比三方达成一致容易。

sentences.en: Many other surveys have produced results essentially in agreement with these figures.
sentences.cn: 许多其他调查已经得出了与这些数据基本一致的结果。

sentences.en: Negotiators again worked right down to the wire to reach an agreement.
sentences.cn: 谈判人员又是直到最后时刻才达成了协议。

sentences.en: Please read the agreement and sign it.
The agreement has raised hopes that the war may end soon.
sentences.cn: 那项协议使人们感到战争有望很快结束。

sentences.en: The agreement should have very positive results in the long term.
sentences.cn: 从长远来看，这个协议将会产生非常积极的影响。

sentences.en: The president was in full agreement with the proposal.
They had made an agreement that they would share the profits equally.
sentences.cn: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.en: This agreement is very ambiguous and open to various interpretations.
sentences.cn: 这份协议非常含糊，可以有多种解释。

sentences.en: Would their discussion result in his agreement to visit his stepmother?
sentences.cn: 他们商量后，他会不会同意去看望继母？

phrases.tran_cn: 达成协议；取得一致意见，达成共识
n. （国际）贸易协定；雇用合同；劳资协议

trans.tran_cn: 协定，意见一致，相符，同意，协议书，呼应
trans.tran_en: an arrangement or promise to do something, made by two or more people, companies, organizations etc
